channel.title: Ian on Ian Worley
channel.description: Recent content in Ian on Ian Worley

item.title: Starting the Programmer's Alliance at the University of Central Missouri: A Journey in the Making - Part 1
item.description: Starting the Programmer’s Alliance at the University of Central Missouri: A Journey in the Making - Part 1 Link to heading As a student of computer science at the University of Central Missouri, I was always searching for ways to dive deeper into the field and improve my skills. During a class discussion about the Association for Computing Machinery workshop on cloud computing, I brought up the idea of starting a programming club with my professor.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Welcome to my website! My name is Ian Worley and I am a college student at the University of Central Missouri currently in my sophomore year. I am currently majoring in Computer Science. I have always had a passion for technology and computer programming, and I created this website as a way to share my knowledge and expertise in these fields with others. As a student in computer science, I understand the importance of staying up to date with the latest developments in technology and the constant evolution of programming languages and frameworks.
